definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算鏟完整條路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: The streetlights lamped the whole street.
X inactivation starts at the X inactivation center(XIC) and spreads throughout the chromosome.
sentences.chinese: 失活開始於XIC，然後傳播到整條染色體。

sentences.english: The street is jammed with taxis and pedicabs.
sentences.chinese: 整條街上到處是出租車和三輪車。

sentences.english: You can't edit messages once they have been posted - the only option is to delete the whole message.
sentences.chinese: 你無法編輯已經發布的消息，只能整條刪除。

sentences.english: All the way so far there were only 'private' beach areas, with pricey entry fees.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止整條路還是私人浴場區，門票極爲昂貴。

sentences.english: That Guy was driving down the center of the road being a hog; he hogged the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 那傢伙開車開在馬路中間象個路霸，霸佔了整條道。

sentences.english: The whole road is covered with snow.
The whole of the edge of the concave and convex, North and south, a long, narrow things.
sentences.chinese: 整條邊樓凹凸有致，南北較長，東西較窄。

sentences.english: Tier 9 was always the most problematic tier of the entire branch.
sentences.chinese: 9級車一直是整條線上最成問題的一輛。

sentences.english: When you open the view, the status bar shows the entire Select statement that you created.
sentences.chinese: 當您打開視圖時，狀態欄將顯示創建的整條選擇語句。

sentences.english: When the electricity went out, our whole street was black.
sentences.chinese: 一旦停電，整條大街變得黑黝黝的。

sentences.english: And with that, he emptied a bucket of horse poop all over her hallway carpet.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他一桶馬糞倒在老太太的整條地毯上。

sentences.english: In the past, bread was only sold in loaves in baked good stores.
sentences.chinese: 以前，麪包都是在烤焙房裏一整條賣的。

sentences.english: They still very much manage that supply chain from crude to customer.
sentences.chinese: 他們始終都控制着從原油到消費者的整條供應鏈。

sentences.english: The whole defence made mistakes today， not just Kalac.
sentences.chinese: 不光是卡拉克，今天整條後防線都在犯錯。
